Stella Namoe Nyomera, nke a na-akpọkarị Namoe Stella Nyomera (amụrụ na 26 Ọgọstụ 1973) bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na ọkà mmụta sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke mpaghara Napak na nzuko omeiwu nke iri nke Uganda, ọkwa ọ nọ na ya kemgbe 2006.
Stella Namoe Nyomera mere ule ọpụpụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na 1987 site na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Kasimeri
N'afọ 1991, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Uganda Asambodo Mmụta na Kangole Girls S.S.S ma nyekwa ya Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na 1994
N'afọ 1998, ọ debanyere aha wee nweta diploma na Project Planning and Management na Imsat Demtac School of Management, Soroti
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na Arts in Democracy and Development na Mahadum Uganda Martyrs na 2012.
